page.title: 13DIWALI
page.content: {by Bhaveshi Kumar When it is {Diwali}we go to a kind of school and when we get there we have to take our shoes off and we go in a hall.In the hall there is a small temple with a god's picture in it. We go there at night.First we do a dance around the temple then we do an{Arti that means we hold a stainless steel plate and on the plate there is some coloured rice and a Diva and some {Kanku}which is a holy red powder and we do a prayer song.Then people give out Indian sweets then we do a stick dance around the small temple.The temple is decorated with flowers and Divas and rose necklaces then people go home.This is our{Festival.}This lasts for nine days.{Diwali}is usually in October or early November and it is a {god's festival.}
